definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo provide the theoretical basis for introducing and breeding a fine variety.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲人工培殖冬蟲夏草選擇優質的蟲種提供基礎。

sentences.english: Conclusion FBCS possesses the sedative and hypnotic effects.
sentences.chinese: 結論冬蟲夏草發酵液具有一定的鎮靜催眠作用。

sentences.english: Cordyceps sinensis is a famous and nourishing herb in traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 冬蟲夏草爲名貴滋補藥。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the clinical efficacy of Cordyceps sinensis in the treatment of chronic kidney diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的系統評價冬蟲夏草治療慢性腎臟疾病的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Learn about medicinal mushrooms like cordyceps.
sentences.chinese: 知道點藥用菌，好比香菇和冬蟲夏草。

sentences.english: Objective This paper aims to explore the preparation and quality control for permeated Emulsion of Compounded Cordyceps.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討複方冬蟲夏草透皮乳膏的製備及其質量控制。

sentences.english: Cordyceps sinensis (Berk. ) Sacc. , a parasitic fungus, is highly valued in China as a tonic food and herbal medicine for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 冬蟲夏草是一種藥食兩用的珍貴滋補品和中藥材。

sentences.english: Aweto preparation can improve the immune function of the patients with lupus nephritis.

sentences.english: The phenol -sulphate acid inspect method of Cordyceps militaris exopolyaccharide was researched.
sentences.chinese: 探討了用硫酸苯酚法測定北冬蟲夏草多糖含量的方法。

sentences.english: Objective The experiment was to observe the effects of cordyceps sinensis on reproduction and testis morphology in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察冬蟲夏草對小鼠生殖功能及睾丸形態的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the quality standards for the Cordyceps sinensis Sacc polysaccharide liposomal oral liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的確定冬蟲夏草多糖脂質體口服液質量標準。

sentences.english: Wash clean aweto with clear water, red jujube uses the fish out after boiled water immerses .
sentences.chinese: 用清水洗淨冬蟲夏草，紅棗用開水浸泡後撈出。

sentences.english: Mr Ma said he dosed his runners on turtle soup and caterpillar fungus.
sentences.chinese: 他讓自己的隊員食用甲魚湯和冬蟲夏草。

sentences.english: From natural Cordyceps sinensis, the sand has to be artificially cultivated Cordyceps old.

sentences.english: Aweto is what medicine, how to use?
sentences.chinese: 冬蟲夏草是什麼藥，怎麼用？
